Class PDFA


  • public class PDFA

    PDFA Class: convert a (BBj-generated) PDF from SYSPRINT or BBjForm to PDF/A 1b Standard by adding the necessary header fields

    See Also:
    []

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and TypeField and Description
      static BBjStringCreator$

      creator: the creator application you might want to set this to your application product name

      static BBjNumberDebug=0

      Debug: set to 1 to get verbose output

      static BBjStringICC$

      ICC Profile to Embed see https://www.adobe.com/digitalimag/adobergb.html

      static BBjStringProducer$

      producer: the producer tool

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and TypeMethod and Description
      static voidupdatePDF(BBjString in$, BBjString out$)

      updatePDF: add PDF/A-1b header data to a PDF file that was created using BBjForm or SYSPRINT

    • Field Detail

      • Creator$

        public static BBjString Creator$

        creator: the creator application you might want to set this to your application product name

      • Debug=0

        public static BBjNumber Debug=0

        Debug: set to 1 to get verbose output

    • Method Detail

      • updatePDF

        public static void updatePDF(BBjString in$, BBjString out$)

        updatePDF: add PDF/A-1b header data to a PDF file that was created using BBjForm or SYSPRINT

        Parameters:
        BBjString inpdf$: the path to the existing PDF file
        BBjString outpdf$: the path to the new PDF file
